name: provider-validation-monorepo
description: Provider Data Validation & Directory Management System - Mono-repo

scripts.test: npm run frontend:test && npm run backend:test
scripts.lint: npm run frontend:lint && npm run backend:lint
scripts.clean: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml down -v && docker system prune -f
scripts.setup: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && pip install -e .
scripts.migrate: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec backend alembic upgrade head
scripts.demo-data: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec backend python -m scripts.generate_demo_data

author: adarsh8081
